Occasionally, you may face bullying from troublemakers, possibly even being robbed or coerced into doing their bidding. However, one fateful day while heading home, you stumble upon a damaged phone. The phone initiated transformation in your life. Spoiler: More This phone has the power to solve all your problems. Moreover, you realize that your life is brimming with countless fascinating discoveries awaiting your exploration.

Wild Cats [v0.3 Public] [LopaPhi] Overview 剧情概要 You are a highly anticipated up and coming volleyball star. Or rather, you were up until you destroyed your shoulder and your prospects along with it by overworking yourself. Now you’re just a nobody who drowned your sorrows away with a series of poor life choices. Spoiler This story takes place after a wake up call following a year of wallowing in despair with a life that spiralled downhill under the shadow of the star volleyball prospect you once were. You have just received a vague invitation for a meeting from the Dean of Baskerville State University, a highly prestigious university, regarding a potential scholarship when no other universities would give the current you a second glance.
The condition of this scholarship however would turn out to be facing your demons as you return to the sport you turned your back on in a new role, becoming the coach of the school’s women’s volleyball team.
But little did you know that facing your demons would be the easiest part of this task as the team is riddled with fatal problems, each threatening to end your scholarship left, right, and centre! Yet by earnestly facing these girls and their issues with your eyes wide open, you might just end up growing in a way you never thought you would. Are you ready to coach the BSU Wild Cats and lead them to victory?

content: Steps of Debauchery [Ep.5.0] [Fooxied] Overview 游戏概述 Follow the steps of Riley, a girl who moves from a small town to the city to help her husband, Mike, pursue his dreams. While Mike is busy with his bar, Riley supports him wholeheartedly and often puts others’ well-being above her own. This leads her into unexpected situations, where she discovers more about her true self and deepest desires. She explores her sexuality in college and unravels her fantasies, takes on the role of a waitress at the bar, engages in activities with an elderly neighbor, streams adventures with his grandson and that’s just the tip of the mountain. Riley’s world is opening wide in front of her, and she waits for you to explore it. 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说 建模引擎：Daz Studio 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：欧美风 版本信息 当前版本：Episode 5.0 发行日期：2025-11-05 Changelog 更新日志 You’ll get around 2,200 new renders, lots of new animations with sound, over 20,000 script words, and 9 new scenes - some of them really big, with up to 400 renders each (for comparison, early scenes had about 50–100). This episode focuses a lot on the school setting. You’ll paint with Beatrice in art class, learn some anatomy with Professor Wilson, and get involved in whatever Dean Scott and Madison are planning - something tells me their rivalry might heat up… or maybe not! Mr. X will play an important role, and Riley will do a live stream with Elijah in a rather unusual place - can’t imagine what people will think when they see that live. Richard will be happy to have Riley’s help during the Whisky Club meeting, and there are a few other scenes I won’t spoil for now. There’s plenty to look forward to in early November! In 2018, a contagion escapes into the city of Grimhaven, Washington, turning everything it touches into lust-fueled monsters. Sisters, Sarah and Ava, must traverse the city, doing their best to avoid the mutations as they attempt to reach sanctuary. Through their journey, the pair will seek the truth of the contagion’s outbreak; a task that will require them to unravel a web of lies that will change them both forever.​

Cosy Cafe [v0.13.1 EA] [Cosy Creator] Overview 游戏概述 Your rough childhood is over, and you stand on the precipice of adulthood with a singular goal in mind: To become an exceptional restaurateur like your grandfather. But for now, you’ll settle for building a modest cafe. Money is tight, and challenges abound balancing your dream with your final year of school, but with hard work and determination you know that you can build a life for yourself and the girls you meet along the way.
In Cosy Cafe you will develop romantic and increasingly sexual relationships with a number of girls, culminating in a harem that eventually becomes a family. There will be a particular focus on wholesome maledom, and of course, there will be a lot of loving and kinky sex!
游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：视觉小说 建模引擎：Honey Select 2 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：亚洲风 版本信息 当前版本：0.13.1 EA 发行日期：2025-11-04 Changelog 更新日志 v0.13.1 Multiple typos and a couple of missing dialogue lines that were added back in. Fixed bug where train sounds kept playing after Akatsuki’s date Fixed rare crashing problem on the save/load screen (temporarily disabled the save page number bar at the bottom scrolling while I work on a more permanent fix) Fixed Annabelle’s page in the replay gallery - this was added in 0.12.1 then accidentally reverted in 0.13.0 Fixed related bug on android where the group scenes in the gallery displayed as Annabelle scenes Fixed bug in the android version where about a dozen of the videos had weird transparent cropping on the edges Updated the patch version to fix an issue with pre-0.13 videos flashing up a transparency page when patching from 0.12.0 instead of 0.12.1 v0.13 The update contains an additional 33,000 words, 2125 renders, and 84 videos, covering September 29th (Saturday) and 30th (Sunday). This one covers the weekend goth event, and contains a lot of sexy scenes, as well as some important character progression. Plus, this is the first outing of the improved graphics/animation, so I’m hoping you enjoy it! Most of the new UI features I mentioned a little while ago made it in, however the day select screen was too riddled with bugs to get it sorted in time, so you won’t see that until next time. Warning: Someone had the bug “ATL appears to be in an infinite loop”. Fortunately it doesn’t appear to be common, and I’ll work on getting a fix out, but in the meantime if you do get this, you can fix it by going into the scripts file and deleting “01fileslots.rpy” and “01fileslots.rpyc”. content: Shattered Minds [v0.22 Beta Fix] [eXtasy Games] Overview 游戏概述 Shattered Minds is an open-world game, in which you take control over the life of a college student. Your normal life is thrown out of whack after you realize you have the power to control the minds of others. You will use this power to make all your dreams, desires and wishes come true! A world with countless quests, figures, plots and locations are waiting to be discovered and controlled by you! Shattered Minds includes plenty of animations, a licensed soundtrack and atmospheric sound effects! Be ready to experience a game full of sexy adventures! All paired with a thrilling, mysterious yet humorous plot. 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说 建模引擎：Daz Studio 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：欧美风 版本信息 当前版本：0.22 Beta Hotfixed 原版发布日：2025-10-31 Changelog 更新日志 Cursory Investigation (Claire – Quest 1) A brief text message* calls you to Spring Hill Police Department. There you meet Claire again. From that point on you sense eyes on you wherever you go, and the shadow that trails you feels like the first clue that something larger is in motion… (* the message triggers the next morning, once Scarlett is part of your harem) Cat and Mouse (Claire – Quest 2) Armed with what you know about Claire’s motives, you decide to turn the tables. You slip deeper into her life until you are part of it, as you begin to undermine and manipulate the close bond between her and her father. Case Closed (Claire – Quest 3) The confrontation between Claire and the MC comes to a head. The MC was too sure of himself and underestimated how sharp a budding detective Claire really is. His overconfidence proves costly. New harem member: Claire: Claire will become a regular members of your harem, with new scenes available for her at your home and at the police station. She can get pregnant and will be able to move into your house. New Smartphone Wallpaper: Claire New side character: Violet: Once you own the gym, she can be encountered in the gym locker room. She takes the new gym rules with enthusiasm… there’s just one problem, her boyfriend is also there. But that’s no challenge you can’t handle. Quality of Life improvement: The Harem Tab now also shows if a harem member is currently set to earn money or XP. Rebalancing: Your harem’s income has been greatly improved to reduce grind. Now, every member can be set to earn you $150/day or 30XP/day (up from $45/day or 15XP/day). Engine Update: The game now runs on Ren’Py 8.4.1. This update improves loading times and resolves issues for operating systems that use non-Latin character sets (such as Russian, Chinese, etc.). content: Astreon [Ch.2 v0.3.5] [NoGlory] Overview 游戏概述 In the year 2032, humanity stands on the brink of a technological breakthrough. A new material, developed by a group of scientists, possesses not only extraordinary strength, hyper-elasticity, and energy-saving properties, but also a unique, or rather exceptional, ability to self-repair. This capability turned the material into a regenerative pill, allowing people with limited abilities to become fully functional humans, while also making them stronger, smarter, and even extending their lifespan. Spoiler: More However, fearing the consequences of such power, the scientists decide to destroy the records, reports, and everything related to their research. They scattered, each going their own way. But as is often the case, someone found the remnants of this work. Ignoring the dangers, they decided to complete it, which eventually led to the formation of a globally banned terrorist organization called “Masquerade.” In response, leaders of major corporations launched a large-scale operation to eliminate the individual responsible and eradicate everything related to the research. You are a former soldier, unable to bear the guilt of the atrocities committed during the operation. You retreat to a remote location on the edge of the world, a small town cut off from the rest of civilization, where you planned to live a peaceful life with your wife and children, far removed from all the troubles of the past. But, as often happens, things do not go according to plan. One day, when your wife goes on a business trip to a certain research institute, she suddenly stops contacting you. In an attempt to find out what happened, you embark on a journey. Days, weeks, months, and years pass… Eventually, you come to terms with the fact that you may never see your wife again, burying all your emotions deep inside. Then, one day, your son arrives, asking for your help and with a glimmer of hope that not all is lost, that there is still a small chance to restore your peaceful life. 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：视觉小说 建模引擎：Honey Select 2 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：亚洲风 版本信息 当前版本：Chapter 2 - 0.3.5 原版发布日：2025-10-31 Changelog 更新日志 2,216 New Images 191 New Animations (40+ Minutes Total) 6 New Gallery Scenes 50+ New Music Tracks 110+ New Sound Effects 5 New Hidden Renders Several Render Fixes Several Code Fixes Lots of Typos Fixed New UI (Thanks, Pax) New Main Menu New Replay Gallery (Hints Now Added) Fixed some older gallery scenes not playing the whole scene And Other Small Things Developer（入正地址） Patreon Itch.io Discord 落谦酱便利贴 落谦酱点评 评分项 评分 点评 建模 ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 渲染 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 SFW剧情（素戏） ⭐⭐⭐☆☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 NSFW剧情（荤戏） ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 BGM ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 时长 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 CG ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 游戏预览图 素图 荤图 DOWNLOAD（官中） Win/Linux（PC端） 下载文件： 官中原版链接：下载官中 安装步骤： 下载官中原版链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 解压官中原版 启动exe游戏，选择简体中文即可 Android（安卓端） 下载文件： 官中原版链接：下载官中 安装步骤： 下载官中原版链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 安装APK文件 启动游戏，选择简体中文即可 iOS（苹果端） 根据PC端的步骤操作即可，再使用 Spark 等模拟器进行游玩 Spark模拟器AppStore有售 宇宙安全声明！ 本文章仅供学习与交流，请勿商用或非法传播 落谦不对因使用本文所产生的任何问题负责

Cross Realms [v0.3.0 Public] [DuskDuck] Overview 游戏概述 On the first day of your college life, you and a group of friends are sucked into a vortex. When you wake up, you realize you’re in a foreign place - this is not Earth. As you explore this new world, you discover it’s a Qi cultivation realm, where power determines everything. Spoiler There are nine Realms, each controlled by a dominant race: Humans, Demons, Deities, Spiritual Beasts, and more. Each Realm has a “spring” - a flow of Qi energy harvested from the Void, the space between Realms. Because of these springs, peace between the Realms is fragile and rarely lasts long. You arrive during the longest period of peace ever known, but how long will this so-called ‘peace’ really last?
As your journey continues, you uncover more secrets about these Realms. Someone in the shadows has been plotting and orchestrating your arrival. Will you be able to stand up for yourself in a world where many see you as nothing more than a useless ant?
The answer are yours to find.

content: Apocalypse 2059 [v0.3] [BigH4nd.Inc] Overview 游戏概述 Apocalypse 2059 Welcome to the savage world of 2059, where survival is a daily struggle and civilization is nothing but a distant memory. The World That Was In 2030, an event known as “The Cataclysm” forever changed the face of Earth. Nuclear weapons claimed lives in an instant, plunging the world into a devastating nuclear winter that lasted over a decade. Civilization, law, and morality crumbled into dust. The surface became an inferno, forcing what little plant life remained to retreat underground. For the few who survived, existence became a constant battle against extinction. Twenty years have passed. The pre-war generation grows old, while a new generation rises, knowing nothing of the world that came before. Spoiler Your Story Begins The story takes place in the year 2059. You, the protagonist, have been living in solitude in a shelter since your birth. These peaceful days are changed by the appearance of a mysterious woman. At her urgent request, you’ll embark on a perilous journey across the savage lands of what was once civilization. Unforgettable Characters Your path will cross with unique survivors, each shaped by the merciless world they inhabit: A reckless and confident villain with her own agenda A young, sensitive tribal leader struggling to protect her people A ruthless warlord carving out her empire silver-tongued treasure hunter seeking fortune in the ruins 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：视觉小说 建模引擎：Honey Select 2 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：亚洲风 版本信息 当前版本：0.3 原版发布日：2025-10-09 Changelog 更新日志 What’s New in Version 0.3? content:
Mayfly [v0.2 Reset] [JasonTon] Overview 游戏概述 “The city’s sewers stink of blood and rust. Portraits of the wealthy and powerful line the streets, attempting to cover up the heinous crimes they’ve committed.”
“Is it truly brightness and warmth that meets you after suffering?” your life.
Spoiler The story is set in the city of Devon, the country’s only mega city. Plagued by a glaring wealth gap, Devon eventually divided into the Uppercity, where company execs and corpos live amidst opulence and luxury, and the Undercity, where factory workers and gangsters, including triads, dwell.
A decade ago, a phenomenon of unknown origin resulted in the sudden emergence of superpowers among individuals in and around the city, primarily among teenagers. However, this unexpected development presented a formidable challenge for the government, as these superpowered individuals started to engage in criminal activities. In particular, they targeted the Uppercity due to deep-rooted inequality, resorting to acts such as kidnapping and murder of the wealthy.
To tackle the rising crime rates, the government is compelled to implement two bills: the Vigilante Act and the Superpowers Act. The former empowers selected individuals with superpowers to go beyond traditional law enforcement measures to combat criminals, while the latter treats superpowered individuals differently from regular humans, eliminating age restrictions and establishing dedicated prisons for them.
Over time, superpowered crime in Devon steadily decreased thanks to the state-funded Vigilantes who are entrusted with the task of upholding justice. However, as the Vigilante force expanded, the balance started to shift as some Vigilantes with concealed motives became a new source of instability in the city. Additionally, after the initial surge of superpowers, no new superpowers have emerged in Devon. This results in a growing public demand for the abolition of the Vigilante Bill, and a change in public perception of Vigilantes from once-revered heroes to a more critical stance.
In such a setting, where you are a member of the Vigilantes, are you truly willing to let others dictate your fate? I believe the answer is unequivocally “Never.” Every decision you make, whether significant or seemingly inconsequential, has the potential to impact the relationships and alliances you form during your journey.
Is it to live fleetingly like a mayfly in this superficially vibrant city, or to leave a lasting legacy as a legend in the streets?
“The power to determine your destiny rests in your hands.”

content: New Family [v0.4.5] [King Peanut] Overview 游戏概述 The story begins with the main character, who lost their parents at a young age, being taken in by a new family. This new family, though not related by blood, is a small, close-knit community that relies on one another. As the main character lives and grows with them, they share in each other’s lives and experiences. The unfolding relationships within this family and the events they encounter together form the central storyline​ 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说 建模引擎：Koikatsu Sunshine 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：日系风 版本信息 当前版本：0.4.5 原版发布日：2025-10-16 汉化分享日：2025-10-17 Changelog 更新日志 This patch includes 2 new NSFW scenes for Noah and 5 new ones for Asami. You can now work out at the gym, and if your Strength is 5 or higher, you might find Asami there at night Asami’s been around since the early builds, but I kept delaying her update for a while. Honestly, her story might be a bit divisive - some people might love it, others might not Still, since the game’s heading toward its ending, I think it’s finally time to move forward with her part.
